verses.verse: At <S%G1722><s%> that time <S%G2540><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day through <S%G1223><s%> the corn; <S%G4702><s%> and his disciples <S%G3101><s%> were an hungered, <S%G3983><s%> and began <S%G756><s%> to pluck <S%G5089><s%> the ears <S%G4719><s%> of corn <S%G4719><s%>and to eat. <S%G2068><s%>

But when the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, they said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your disciples <S%G3101><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day.

But he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Have you not read <S%G314><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he was an hungered, <S%G3983><s%> and they that were with him;

How <S%G4459><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and did eat <S%G5315><s%> the show bread, <S%G740><s%> <S%G4286><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was not lawful <S%G1832><s%> for him to eat, <S%G5315><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> for them which were with him, but only <S%G3441><s%> for the priests? <S%G2409><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> have you not read <S%G314><s%> in the law, <S%G3551><s%> how that on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> days the priests <S%G2409><s%> in the temple <S%G2411><s%> profane <S%G953><s%> the sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> and are blameless? <S%G338><s%>
But I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That in this <S%G5602><s%> place <S%G5602><s%> is one greater <S%G3187><s%> than the temple. <S%G2411><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> you had known <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> this means, <S%G2076><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> have mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and not sacrifice, <S%G2378><s%> you would not have condemned <S%G2613><s%> the guiltless. <S%G338><s%>
For the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is Lord <S%G2962><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> of the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day.
And when <S%G3753><s%> he was departed <S%G3327><s%> there, <S%G1564><s%> he went <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> their synagogue: <S%G4864><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was a man <S%G444><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> withered. <S%G3584><s%> And they asked <S%G1905><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> to heal <S%G2323><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> days? that they might accuse <S%G2723><s%> him.

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, What <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> shall there be among <S%G1537><s%> you, that shall have <S%G2192><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sheep, <S%G4263><s%> and if <S%G1437><s%> it fall <S%G1706><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a pit <S%G999><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day, will he not lay hold <S%G2902><s%> on it, and lift <S%G1453><s%> it out?

How <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> is a man <S%G444><s%> better <S%G1308><s%> than a sheep? <S%G4263><s%> Why <S%G5620><s%> it is lawful <S%G1832><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> days.

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he to the man, <S%G444><s%> Stretch <S%G1614><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%> And he stretched <S%G1614><s%> it forth; <S%G1614><s%> and it was restored <S%G600><s%> whole, <S%G5199><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> as the other. <S%G243><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out, and held <S%G2983><s%> a council <S%G4824><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> him, how <S%G3704><s%> they might destroy <S%G622><s%> him.

But when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> it, he withdrew <S%G402><s%> himself from there: <S%G1564><s%> and great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him, and he healed <S%G2323><s%> them all; <S%G3956><s%>
And charged <S%G2008><s%> them that they should not make <S%G4160><s%> him known: <S%G5318><s%>
That it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> by Esaias <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Behold <S%G2400><s%> my servant, <S%G3816><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have chosen; <S%G140><s%> my beloved, <S%G27><s%> in whom <S%G3739><s%> my soul <S%G5590><s%> is well <S%G2106><s%> pleased: <S%G2106><s%> I will put <S%G5087><s%> my spirit <S%G4151><s%> on him, and he shall show <S%G518><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> to the Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>
He shall not strive, <S%G2051><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> cry; <S%G2905><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> shall any <S%G5100><s%> man hear <S%G191><s%> his voice <S%G5456><s%> in the streets. <S%G4113><s%>

A bruised <S%G4937><s%> reed <S%G2563><s%> shall he not break, <S%G2608><s%> and smoking <S%G5187><s%> flax <S%G3043><s%> shall he not quench, <S%G4570><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> he send <S%G1544><s%> forth <S%G1544><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> to victory. <S%G3534><s%>
And in his name <S%G3686><s%> shall the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> trust. <S%G1679><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> was brought <S%G4374><s%> to him one possessed <S%G1139><s%> with a devil, <S%G1139><s%> blind, <S%G5185><s%> and dumb: <S%G2974><s%> and he healed <S%G2323><s%> him, so <S%G5620><s%> that the blind <S%G5185><s%> and dumb <S%G2974><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> and saw. <S%G991><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> were amazed, <S%G1839><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> Is not this <S%G3778><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of David? <S%G1138><s%>

But when the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, they said, <S%G2036><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> fellow does not cast <S%G1544><s%> out devils, <S%G1140><s%> but by Beelzebub <S%G954><s%> the prince <S%G758><s%> of the devils. <S%G1140><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> their thoughts, <S%G1761><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Every <S%G3956><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> is brought <S%G2049><s%> to desolation; <S%G2049><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> shall not stand: <S%G2476><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> out Satan, <S%G4567><s%> he is divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> himself; <S%G1438><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall then <S%G3767><s%> his kingdom <S%G932><s%> stand? <S%G2476><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> I by Beelzebub <S%G954><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> out devils, <S%G1140><s%> by whom <S%G5101><s%> do your <S%G5216><s%> children <S%G5207><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> them out? therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> they shall be your <S%G5216><s%> judges. <S%G2923><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> I cast <S%G1544><s%> out devils <S%G1140><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> then <S%G686><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is come <S%G5348><s%> to you.

Or <S%G2228><s%> else how <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a strong <S%G2478><s%> man's house, <S%G3614><s%> and spoil <S%G1283><s%> his goods, <S%G4632><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> he first <S%G4412><s%> bind <S%G1210><s%> the strong <S%G2478><s%> man? and then <S%G5119><s%> he will spoil <S%G1283><s%> his house. <S%G3614><s%>
He that is not with me is against <S%G2596><s%> me; and he that gathers <S%G4863><s%> not with me scatters <S%G4650><s%> abroad. <S%G4650><s%>

Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, All <S%G3956><s%> manner of sin <S%G266><s%> and blasphemy <S%G988><s%> shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> to men: <S%G444><s%> but the blasphemy <S%G988><s%> against the Holy Ghost <S%G4151><s%> shall not be forgiven <S%G863><s%> to men. <S%G444><s%>

And whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> speaks <S%G2036><s%> a word <S%G3056><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> it shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> him: but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> speaks <S%G2036><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> it shall not be forgiven <S%G863><s%> him, neither <S%G3777><s%> in this <S%G5129><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> in the world to come. <S%G3195><s%>

Either <S%G2228><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> the tree <S%G1186><s%> good, <S%G2570><s%> and his fruit <S%G2590><s%> good; <S%G2570><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> else make <S%G4160><s%> the tree <S%G1186><s%> corrupt, <S%G4550><s%> and his fruit <S%G2590><s%> corrupt: <S%G4550><s%> for the tree <S%G1186><s%> is known <S%G1097><s%> by his fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

O generation <S%G1081><s%> of vipers, <S%G2191><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> you, being <S%G5607><s%> evil, <S%G4190><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> good <S%G18><s%> things? for out of the abundance <S%G4051><s%> of the heart <S%G2588><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> speaks. <S%G2980><s%>

A good <S%G18><s%> man <S%G444><s%> out of the good <S%G18><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> of the heart <S%G2588><s%> brings <S%G1544><s%> forth <S%G1544><s%> good <S%G18><s%> things: and an evil <S%G4190><s%> man <S%G444><s%> out of the evil <S%G4190><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> brings <S%G1544><s%> forth evil <S%G4190><s%> things.

But I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That every <S%G3956><s%> idle <S%G692><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> that men <S%G444><s%> shall speak, <S%G2980><s%> they shall give <S%G591><s%> account <S%G3056><s%> thereof <S%G4012><s%> <S%G846><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment. <S%G2920><s%>
For by your words <S%G3056><s%> you shall be justified, <S%G1344><s%> and by your words <S%G3056><s%> you shall be condemned. <S%G2613><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> we would <S%G2309><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> a sign <S%G4592><s%> from you.

But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, An evil <S%G4190><s%> and adulterous <S%G3428><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> seeks <S%G1934><s%> after <S%G1934><s%> a sign; <S%G4592><s%> and there shall no <S%G3756><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> be given <S%G1325><s%> to it, but the sign <S%G4592><s%> of the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Jonas: <S%G2495><s%>

For as Jonas <S%G2495><s%> was three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and three <S%G5140><s%> nights <S%G3571><s%> in the whale's <S%G2785><s%> belly; <S%G2836><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and three <S%G5140><s%> nights <S%G3571><s%> in the heart <S%G2588><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

The men <S%G435><s%> of Nineveh <S%G3536><s%> shall rise <S%G450><s%> in judgment <S%G2920><s%> with this <S%G5026><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%> and shall condemn <S%G2632><s%> it: because <S%G3754><s%> they repented <S%G3340><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> the preaching <S%G2782><s%> of Jonas; <S%G2495><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a greater <S%G4119><s%> than Jonas <S%G2495><s%> is here. <S%G5602><s%>

The queen <S%G938><s%> of the south <S%G3558><s%> shall rise <S%G1453><s%> up in the judgment <S%G2920><s%> with this <S%G5026><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%> and shall condemn <S%G2632><s%> it: for she came <S%G2064><s%> from the uttermost <S%G4009><s%> parts of the earth <S%G1093><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of Solomon; <S%G4672><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a greater <S%G4119><s%> than Solomon <S%G4672><s%> is here. <S%G5602><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> is gone <S%G1831><s%> out of a man, <S%G444><s%> he walks <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> dry <S%G504><s%> places, <S%G5117><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> rest, <S%G372><s%> and finds <S%G2147><s%> none. <S%G3756><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> I will return <S%G1994><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my house <S%G3624><s%> from where <S%G3606><s%> I came <S%G1831><s%> out; and when he is come, <S%G2064><s%> he finds <S%G2147><s%> it empty, <S%G4980><s%> swept, <S%G4563><s%> and garnished. <S%G2885><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> goes <S%G4198><s%> he, and takes <S%G3880><s%> with himself <S%G1438><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> more wicked <S%G4191><s%> than himself, <S%G1438><s%> and they enter <S%G1525><s%> in and dwell <S%G2730><s%> there: <S%G1563><s%> and the last <S%G2078><s%> state of that man <S%G444><s%> is worse <S%G5501><s%> than the first. <S%G4413><s%> Even so <S%G3779><s%> shall it be also <S%G2532><s%> to this <S%G5026><s%> wicked <S%G4190><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

While he yet <S%G2089><s%> talked <S%G2980><s%> to the people, <S%G3793><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> his mother <S%G3384><s%> and his brothers <S%G80><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> without, <S%G1854><s%> desiring <S%G2212><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> with him.

Then <S%G5119><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your mother <S%G3384><s%> and your brothers <S%G80><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> without, <S%G1854><s%> desiring <S%G2212><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> with you.
But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him that told <S%G2036><s%> him, Who <S%G5101><s%> is my mother? <S%G3384><s%> and who <S%G5101><s%> are my brothers?

And he stretched <S%G1614><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> toward <S%G1909><s%> his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Behold <S%G2400><s%> my mother <S%G3384><s%> and my brothers! <S%G80><s%>

For whoever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall do <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of my Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> is my brother, <S%G80><s%> and sister, <S%G79><s%> and mother. <S%G3384><s%>
